job_title: Sterile Processing Supervisor in Flint, MI
pros: The place has good structure.
cons: Management shows favoritism, and people are very messy.

review_title: Union did not help get a fair wage (which surprised me!)
job_title: Neurodiagnostic Technologist in Grand Blanc, MI
pros: Location is on a beautiful campus and there is no charge for employee parking.  Offers part time positions with offered benefits! They have kind, dedicated Chaplains with areas to pray ect.
cons: Union verse corporation Management is a way Ascension has ignored safety, medical report inaccuracies, fair wages and understaffing. Each “side” says it’s the other’s responsibility if a problem may arise.  Calls itself a “Neuroscience Institute” and did not recognize the Neurodiagnostic Technologies!    Also Neurodiagnostic Week was ignored with blatant disrespect; the following week celebration everywhere for Nurses Week.  Many patients were negatively affected by the understaffing and yes even lack of PPE!!  Many years of inaccurate testing/reporting as they did not have a registered Technologist working for several years. The environment was almost toxic.

job_title: Family Nurse Practitioner in Brighton, MI
pros: Close to home. Newer facility.
cons: Not enough nurses. No one sues hospitals for being under staffed.

job_title: Environmental Services Manager in Grand Blanc, MI
pros: Decent pay and benefits. Good upward mobility for managers
cons: Hospital setting. Always short staffed

job_title: Pharmacy Technician in Grand Blanc, MI
pros:
Coworkers
Pay
Union
You get double time and pto when you work a holiday
cons:
Management
Work every other weekend and holidays

job_title: Registered Nurse in Austin, TX
pros: Cafeteria is awesome and has a great selection.
cons: Parking is almost non-existent. Parking garage is dangerous.

job_title: Registered Nurse in Flint, MI
pros: We still operate with a union
cons: Staffing situation is not the greatest

review_title: GCC.Feeling the loss and nothing matters as they slowly strip our benifits from us. Union NOT protecting the little guy.
job_title: Certified Nursing Assistant in Grand Blanc, MI
pros: Feels like home with majority of the staff. Longevity in most staff members. We all seem to help one another for the most part.  Great care from those loyal employees.
cons: Under appreciated for the most part. Morale is in the toilet. Union keeps the trash and/or relocates them. Abuse? no she would never do that 'high fives employees that she got away with it' swept under the rug as they have for years. Management does not stand with and protect you. Good people have been let go and or quit because of the injustice. Gossiping and there is no anonymity in house ...  heck I will be found out here too ...

review_title: Delightful,I was downsized in a multi-staff reduction to reduce costs. My last performance review rated me as excellent/
job_title: Chaplain Specialist in Davenport, IA
pros: I love the new layout of your stores. I spent 26 years in the Substance Abuse field and am profoundly grateful for this companies emphasis on health , including smoking cessation. I recently visited one of your stores and was highly impressed by the friendly and accepting nature of all your employees. It looks like it would be a wonderful place to learn new skills.
cons: I am also a grief counselor in private practice and have a very limited number of patients. I can work private counseling around work schedules quite easily. This is an exciting opportunity. I can aid in management issues if asked as I have had many years of experience in dealing with people. I see no conflict in working with this company and my life in any way. Please give me the opportunity to interview.

job_title: Lab Assistant in Grand Blanc, MI
pros: MOST of the patient interactions are great. At Genesys that have a beautiful facility and the grounds are gorgeous. There's even a walking trail.
cons: Expect a full time work load with part time benefits. The Lab is a joke and the people are terrible to work with. They will blow up your phone asking you to come in and pick up extra shifts. If you don't pick up , you can expect to receive attitudes from your coworkers. There are far too many people there that want to be the boss, and management is MIA  and very rarely do they answer their pagers.  Expect minimal training and to be short staffed often. There are no repercussions for calling in.  The staff is embarrassing to be around at times and very unprofessional. The lab and nurses have an 'us VS them' mentality and hardly work as a team.

job_title: in Grand Blanc, MI
pros:
Compensation is good with decent benefits.
There's ample opportunities to move to different departments or jobs.
Nurses have a good, large union.  (Other unions in the hospital are smaller.)
cons:
Executives in the hospital have created a "us vs. them" feeling with 'them' being anyone who isn't an executive or management.  They treat employees as dispensable. 
Retirement benefits are lousy.

job_title: Catering Associate in Grand Blanc, MI
pros:
Work with school schedules
Entry level paying more than minimum wage
Love my coworkers
Hiring from within so if you are looking for advancement into the medical field it is a great foot in the door
Full benefits
Retirement plan
Paid time off
Union (can be a con depending on your stance)
cons: Management has poor communication and poor management skills but not to the point where it isn't worth it to work for this department

review_title: The Union keeps people who do not want or deserve to work, employed.
job_title: Tech in Grand Blanc, MI
pros: There's always something new to learn.
cons: Higher management seems to only care about how their department is viewed and not internal issues within that department.

job_title: Property Management Director in Grand Blanc, MI
pros: There is a sense of community.  The people support each other, like family.
cons: Healthcare is experiencing financial restraints,  Genesys is suffering from double whammies - Genesee County declining populations base and economic base affects the hospital's financial stability.

job_title: RCIS in Grand Blanc, MI
pros: Great person and hard worker. Been in the Cath lab as an RCIS for 13 hrs and great at my job I love what I do and my patients.
cons: Non it was just my time for a change and wanted to move to Kissimmee area.

job_title: Registered Nurse in Grand Blanc, MI
pros: Friendly environment.   The emergency department survives on teamwork.   Individuals are made to feel important no matter what their position is.  If you like being a part of a successful team, you will love it here too.
cons: Management changes every few years.  Not a good place to go into management

review_title: Not a great place to work.

review_title: Not what it used to be.

cons: Frequent 8 hour mandation without rest period, Staffed the same throughout hospital regardless of acuity, equipment old/ broken on some floors.

job_title: Registered Nurse in Rock Island, IL

cons: Wages are terrible. Work extra never compensated enough. Does not offer double pay ever! Health insurance premiums are based on a physical assessment done very year.

review_title: Horrible.   Extremely  low moral, current workforce does not care.  We are just a body to cover certain areas.
